name: Magic Solitaire Collection
description:
* Play variety of lovely classic, vintage klondike and pyramid card games
* Combine different types of visual elements to create the most attractive puzzle style
* Check your progress in this addictive solitaire via statistics and experience level
* Both adults and kids will have fun!
* You can enjoy this free offline solitaire anytime!
* Card game is available to play on smartphones and tablet devices.

Classic card solitaire, spider solitaire, klondike or pyramid solitaire – what game are you choosing today? All of these vintage card puzzles improve the attention and logic so that both adults and kids can have so much fun.
Welcome to the great world of free solitaire games!

Join us on Facebook too: https://www.facebook.com/MagicSolitaireCollection/
